articles.author: Patricia Battle
articles.title: Bank of America cracks down on a disturbing workplace trend - TheStreet
articles.description: The banking giant raises eyebrows with its latest move to tackle a startling issue.
articles.content: Last year, Bank of America (BAC) suffered harsh criticism after its employee, Leo Lukenas III, who was 35 years old, died of a blood clot in his heart after working 100-hour workweeks at the company.… [+3327 chars]
